content: आभू {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> <ab>Ved.</ab> To be present, continue one's existence.

आभू {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Approaching(as a praiser.) {@--2@} Strong, sufficient, efficacious. {@--3@} Applied according to rule (as a hymn). {@--4@} Very prosperous. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A prison, a place of confinement.
